resources.string: Welcome to our Events in Paris app !
Please click the following button to access your favorites :
In this app, you will have access to a very complete database of activities you can do in Paris. After clicking the \"Start\" button, you will have access to different event category lists.
"Lorem ipsum dolores blablabla event description very good okay "
URL from where we get data : https://events-in-paris.cleverapps.io
The principal libraries that we have used are the following :
Retrofit : allows us to make requests to the internet in order to get your database information
Picasso : lets us download a picture on our Android app by using their URL
